Name: Quitting Ordinary
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Earl Grey tea tannins balance rich crème de cassis in this bittersweet, aperitif cocktail.
History: Created in 2015 by Tom Blundell at Cosy Kettle, London, England.
